page.title: 11EDUCATION ALAMEDA SCHOOL
page.content: Alameda Middle School is a modern and well looked after school. In the year 1985 it has 506 pupils divided into four year groups. There are twenty Teachers, one Headmaster and three assistants.Many subjects are covered on the curriculum from Domestic Science through to Library Techniques. The children wear a uniform which is basically; Black blazer, grey trousers or skirt, white or pale coloured shirt or blouse, sensible footwear and a tie in the school colours which are Gold and Black. In the school year 1984/5 the second year children all became involved in the Domesday Project.Over a period of five months they looked closely at their locality,interviewed many people visited local sites and buildings and indeed through the project became more aware of their locale and environment.
